lead_paragraph: Mr. Tucker’s frustrations in persuading the authorities in Stalin’s Russia to let his new Russian wife accompany him home to the United States gave him crucial  insights into the Soviet leader.
snippet: Mr. Tucker’s frustrations in persuading the authorities in Stalin’s Russia to let his new Russian wife accompany him home to the United States gave him crucial  insights into the Soviet leader.

headline.main: Robert C. Tucker, a Scholar of Marx, Stalin and Soviet Affairs, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Robert C. Tucker, a Scholar of Marx, Stalin and Soviet Affairs, Dies at 92
